glsa.title: VLC media player: Format string vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in VLC media player, allowing for the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: VLC media player is a multimedia player for various audio and video formats.

description.p: David Thiel from iSEC Partners Inc. discovered format string errors in various plugins when parsing data. The affected plugins include Vorbis, Theora, CDDA and SAP.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted media file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running VLC media player.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
